alert.note: Alert for Adams; Blackford; Jay; Wells (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Blackford, southeastern Wells, Adams and northern Jay Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 400 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Montpelier, or 10 miles south of Bluffton, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bluffton around 405 PM EDT. Berne and Geneva around 415 PM EDT. Monroe around 420 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Bryant, Nottingham, Poneto, Travisville, Ceylon, Wellsburg, Reiffsburg, Dillman, Petroleum and Keystone. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
